title: After Hours
description: In Tallahassee, Dwight and Todd Packer try to romance Nellie to get the VP position, while Jim wonders if a colleague is trying to hit on him. Back in Scranton, Val's boyfriend shows up with a message for Darryl.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Hey Angela, you wanna see a picture of Phillip wearing those little booties you got us?

quotes.speaker: Angela
quotes.text: So cute.

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.text: Hey, you guys want to see a picture of Gerald wearing galoshes? He refused to go out in the rain until I bought these. Now going out in the rain is all he wants to do.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Oscar thinks that having a dog is just like having a baby.

quotes.speaker: Angela
quotes.text: News flash - If you didn't carry it around for nine months, it isn't your kid.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Exactly. Unless you adopted, of course.

quotes.speaker: Angela
quotes.text: That is where we disagree.

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.text: Hey, are your little dudes crawling yet?

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: No, three-month-old humans don't do that.

quotes.speaker: Angela
quotes.text: My Phillip is crawling.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Angela is such a liar!

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.text: It's maddening!

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.text: Exactly. That's just like crate training. All night long, all night long.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Well count yourself lucky. Wait until you have two. That's two sleep schedules, two naps that don't coincide, I mean, you'll never sleep again.

quotes.speaker: Angela
quotes.text: No one said "you must have two"

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.text: Like her genes are so important. The world just needs more Pam/Jim DNA. Thank you, no.

quotes.speaker: Angela
quotes.text: No thank you.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: [laughing] Check this out. My brother just got a new sailboat. He has NO idea what he just got himself into. There's nothing harder than taking care of a boat...am i right?

quotes.speaker: {angela}/{pam}
quotes.text: Unbelievable!

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.text: Un-be-liev-a-ble.

quotes.speaker: Nellie
quotes.text: It is the end of the day, it is the end of the week. We managed to fill 40 hours somehow. That's not bad, is it?

quotes.speaker: Todd Packer
quotes.text: That's great.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Pretty good.

quotes.speaker: Nellie
quotes.text: Well thank you. This is very helpful feedback. [Dwight raises his hand] Dwight, I am still not ready to name a VP.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: [laughing] That's not what I was going to ask. Gosh, jump to conclusions. Come on, I know, you've got so much on your plate. Right now, you're like 'oh, what's more important? Dwight's question, figure out who's the VP?' Dwight, VP. Dwight, VP. Dwight, VP. Dwight, VP.

quotes.speaker: Nellie
quotes.text: I can't be hypnotized, Dwight. I tried it, I ended up smoking more.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Can we at least eliminate those that are not in the running? Free them up to focus more completely on the menial. Like stacking or sorting, or-

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Catching butterflies.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: That's a hobby, unless it's for food.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Theater.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Waste of time.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Dragging.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: That's just a verb.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Dragging sticks.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Yes, nice, perfect. Dragging sticks.

quotes.speaker: Nellie
quotes.text: Alright, I'm gonna eliminate three people right now, okay? Just... you three, no.

quotes.speaker: Todd Packer
quotes.text: Not good enough (clicks tongue)

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: English peoples' main use today is judging American talent. [British accent] You're crap. You're wonderful. [back to American] They're mean, but they're incisive.

quotes.speaker: Nellie
quotes.text: Everyone meet in the hotel bar at 7:00. I'm not allowed to say it's mandatory, so let's just call it compulsory.

quotes.speaker: Todd Packer
quotes.text: I'll be there at 6:00

quotes.speaker: Cathy
quotes.text: Ugh, we're gonna have one of those crazy nights, aren't we? Maybe we'll see the real 'Talla-nasty' we've been hearing so much about.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: 'Talla-nasty', very clever.

quotes.speaker: Cathy
quotes.text: Thank you-

quotes.speaker: Gabe
quotes.text: Wait, wait, you think she invented 'Talla-nasty?' [chuckles] no, no, no, no...

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Cathy? It's been great. Fun, normal. [in voiceover] I thought I was gonna be hanging out with stanley on this trip, but he's turned out to be kind of a loose cannon.

quotes.speaker: Stanley
quotes.text: My friend and I are new here in Tallahassee. Would you like to get a cocktail? [Jim slowly slinks down in his seat, with the 'Jim Face']. Maybe go out for a little dancing. Beautiful day, no?

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Okay, everybody. 5:00. Workday is over. Put your pencils down. Aaannnnddd bring 'em back up, because now, the late night work jam begins!

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Yes, the conference room is set up. I've got pens, I've got paper, I've got a whiteboard, we are good to go!

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Say what?

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: We are good to goooo!

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Say what?

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: We're good to goooo!

quotes.speaker: Angela
quotes.text: Stop it.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Say-

quotes.speaker: Angela
quotes.text: Stop it.

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.text: Andy.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Tonight we're staying late to service the accounts of the people who went on the Florida trip.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Yes, of course, we could've just been doing this the whole time, but SOMEONE dropped the ball.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: ...ball droppings can be beautiful. For example, when it turns an awkward soprano into a rich, full tenor.

quotes.speaker: Todd Packer
quotes.text: Jason Bourne would kick Bond's ass.

quotes.speaker: Nellie
quotes.text: Jason Bourne has no support staff. His own government's out to get him.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Genghis Khan could take 'em both down 'cause he's not afraid to kill children ... What? it's true. He- He would- he would eviscerate babies and hang them from poles outside of the villages. (Jim taps Dwight on the shoulder)

quotes.speaker: Todd Packer
quotes.text: Okay, drinking game. Count of three, take three sips.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: That's a stupid game. I got a great drinking game. Okay, everyone empty your pockets. Whoever has the most seeds is the king. Whoever has the least buttons is the hunchback.

quotes.speaker: Gabe
quotes.text: What happens if you're the hunchback?

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Oh, you get kicked.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: How many buttons do you have?

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: (takes out bag) 40. Always.

quotes.speaker: Cathy
quotes.text: Can I see?

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Sure. (Hands bag to Cathy)

quotes.speaker: Cathy
quotes.text: So, I get to kick you now.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: No, they're not transferrable just 'cause I handed 'em to you.

quotes.speaker: Cathy
quotes.text: Well, that's how I played it in college.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: College rules (Cathy throws Jim the bag and Jim kicks Dwight)

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Aah!

quotes.speaker: Todd Packer
quotes.text: Aaaaand he host at his own lame game.

quotes.speaker: Nellie
quotes.text: Ooh, double meaning! The game was lame, and now he's lame from the kick. Quick wit.

quotes.speaker: Todd Packer
quotes.text: Thank you.

quotes.speaker: None
quotes.text: (Dwight looks on angrily)

quotes.speaker: Ryan
quotes.text: I'll have a glass of your oakiest chardonnay, please.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: And I will have waffle with your mapliest syrup.

quotes.speaker: Waitress
quotes.text: Sorry, no waffles.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Oh, okay. Just forget it, then. Forget it. Forget it.

quotes.speaker: Ryan
quotes.text: A waffle?

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: A hotel waffle. I know what I want to eat. Is that crazy?

quotes.speaker: Ryan
quotes.text: No.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: I'm moving down here, you know.

quotes.speaker: Ryan
quotes.text: Oh, no, I didn't know.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: I'm young, and I can ... and if I can't, I'm still pretty young. I guess I'll always be young.

quotes.speaker: Ryan
quotes.text: You come with me. We're gonna get you that waffle.

quotes.speaker: Ryan
quotes.text: Why would Erin confide in me that she's staying here in Florida if she didn't want me to make some last-ditch, nothing to lose, Kelly Ka-who run at her? (Erin walks over) Hey.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Hey.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Watson carpet and tile.

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.text: One order.

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.text: Order reference number 00983-126.

quotes.speaker: Phyllis
quotes.text: Eight Cases, bright white inkjet.

quotes.speaker: Angela
quotes.text: Paid.

quotes.speaker: Kelly
quotes.text: I'm dying!

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.text: Processed.

quotes.speaker: Val
quotes.text: And delivered.

quotes.speaker: Kelly
quotes.text: Sometimes I get so bored I just want to scream, and then sometimes I actually do scream. I just sorta feel out what the situation calls for.

quotes.speaker: Nellie
quotes.text: I will be right back.

quotes.speaker: Todd Packer
quotes.text: I will be here.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Hey. I see what you're doing. It's futile. the VP position is mine.

quotes.speaker: Todd Packer
quotes.text: Oh, please, You're through. She's going to give it to me as I'm giving it to her tonight. The cowgirl has chosen her saddle. [clicks tongue, whinnies]

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Well, saddles... [clicks tongue, whinnies] ... sometimes fall off, especially if you don't properly cinch the girth.

quotes.speaker: Todd Packer
quotes.text: What? That's a joke, right? You see the way she's all over me.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: If anyone's having sex with Nellie for personal gain, it's me, and I'm not joking at all. If you don't tighten your saddle, you may fall off.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Who is ready for dinner? "oh, I bet it's pizza, or tacos, or something stupid". No. [claps] I went south of the border for this. And then I went south of that border. And we have ourselves... [takes foil off tray] [Jamaican accent] A Jamaican feast, mon!

quotes.speaker: None
quotes.text: [Disapproval from everyone else]

quotes.speaker: Phyllis
quotes.text: If I wanted Jamaican food I'd just hire a bunch of bodyguards and go there.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Additional trivia factoid, this food comes to us through Val. And our server is none other than Brandon, her boyf!

quotes.speaker: Val
quotes.text: Hey.

quotes.speaker: Brandon
quotes.text: How you doing, Val? [Val and Brandon kiss]

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.text: Jamaican, huh? I just read about the elections down there. Crazy stuff.

quotes.speaker: Brandon
quotes.text: Oh no, I'm not actually Jamaican.

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.text: Terrific.

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.text: What's up man? I'm Darryl.

quotes.speaker: Brandon
quotes.text: Darryl, I heard about you. You doing good?

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.text: Oh yeah.

quotes.speaker: Brandon
quotes.text: Must be doing real good since you're f***ing my girlfriend.

quotes.speaker: Everyone
quotes.text: Whoa.

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.text: Dude, you didn't tell me you were f***ing Val. High five!

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.text: I'm not sleeping with your girlfriend.

quotes.speaker: Val
quotes.text: Brandon, what the hell are you talking about?

quotes.speaker: Brandon
quotes.text: Don't play dumb with me. I know what's up.

quotes.speaker: Val
quotes.text: Honey, I am not sleeping with-

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Heyyy... let's get back to the food. Brandon, tell us about these delicious looking goops!

quotes.speaker: Brandon
quotes.text: Hope you all like goat.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Goat...

quotes.speaker: Nellie
quotes.text: Blow in my ear.

quotes.speaker: Todd Packer
quotes.text: Alright.

quotes.speaker: Nellie
quotes.text: Like I'm on the beach.

quotes.speaker: None
quotes.text: [Packer blows in Nellie's ear]

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: [imitates seagull calls] Seagull. [Continues seagull calls]

quotes.speaker: Nellie
quotes.text: And a wave crashing... a wave crashing.

quotes.speaker: None
quotes.text: [Packer and Dwight imitate waves]

quotes.speaker: Nellie
quotes.text: Oh, that is lovely.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Alright, that's gonna do it for me tonight. Have a lovely evening.

quotes.speaker: None
quotes.text: [Cathy knocks on Jim's door and Jim answers]

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Hey, how's it going?

quotes.speaker: Cathy
quotes.text: Hey, uh, good. Uh, the heating system though in my room is all messed up. It's like 90 degrees in there. Maintenance is working on it. Can I hang out here?

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Uh... yeah, I'm just watching basketball.

quotes.speaker: Cathy
quotes.text: Okay, yeah.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Okay.

quotes.speaker: Cathy
quotes.text: Cool... [Jumps onto bed] Is this March Madness? I love March Madness.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Oh, no, that's not this 'cause that's in... March. Uh, this is just the NBA. Professional. Miami Heat, actually, so... [sits on floor]

quotes.speaker: Cathy
quotes.text: LeBron James.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Yes, nice. Good word association

quotes.speaker: Cathy
quotes.text: [giggles]

quotes.speaker: None
quotes.text: [Cathy walks over to mini fridge and bends over to take something out. Jim looks away]

quotes.speaker: None
quotes.text: [Packer takes string out of his mouth]

quotes.speaker: Nellie
quotes.text: Impressive.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Oh please, anyone can tie a knot, the real skill is in untying it [puts string in his mouth]

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Thornwood Wholesalers.

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.text: One order.

quotes.speaker: Brandon
quotes.text: I read the text you sent to Val, man.

quotes.speaker: Val
quotes.text: That's messed up.

quotes.speaker: Angela
quotes.text: Is this spicy?

quotes.speaker: Brandon
quotes.text: No, baby girl. It would be messed up if I didn't find anything, but I did, so-

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: I'm pretty sure if Darryl sent Val a text, it was about some paper emergency or something.

quotes.speaker: Brandon
quotes.text: At midnight?

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: ... yeah...

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.text: It happens! Like a hospital needs more napkins for surgery...

quotes.speaker: Kelly
quotes.text: Guys, we're not gonna settle anything this way. I think we just need to be grown-ups here.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Thank you.

quotes.speaker: Kelly
quotes.text: I thin we're gonna need to here those texts.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Kelly, remember how you wanted to go home before?

quotes.speaker: Kelly
quotes.text: No. There's no way in hell I'm leaving. Something interesting is happening here for once in my life, I am staying here. Darryl, read the texts.

quotes.speaker: None
quotes.text: [Knock at the door]

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Yup, coming. [opens door] All right.

quotes.speaker: Stanley
quotes.text: My mini bar is oddly out of rum.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: We have plenty.

quotes.speaker: Stanley
quotes.text: Oh, hello. [laughs with Cathy]

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Do you want to watch the game with us? We're watching a game. The Heat game. Just a game.

quotes.speaker: Stanley
quotes.text: Got it. Good night. Careful Jim, it gets easier and easier.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: No, no, no, Stanley.

quotes.speaker: Stanley
quotes.text: mm-hmm. [about to leave]

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Stanley. Stanley.

quotes.speaker: Stanley
quotes.text: uh-huh.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Stanley. Uhh... you know what? Just bring back those bottles!

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Whoa. the lights are still on.

quotes.speaker: Ryan
quotes.text: Yeah, they keep them on 'cause it's less expensive than turning them on and off.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: I like how guys just know stuff all the time.

quotes.speaker: Ryan
quotes.text: Girls know a lot of stuff too, okay? And nobody knows more than you. Especially me.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: [gasps] Hello, waffle iron.

quotes.speaker: Ryan
quotes.text: Hello, what do we have here?

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Okay, so the recipe says we need a mixing bowl...

quotes.speaker: Ryan
quotes.text: Right.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: ... a measuring cup...

quotes.speaker: Ryan
quotes.text: Got that. [Metallic thud] Get down.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: [whispers] It's the fuzz!

quotes.speaker: Ryan
quotes.text: [whispers] Shh! do you want us to get scolded? Shut your beautiful, beautiful mouth, please.

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.text: "I got too much ice cream. You want some?" "Getting' my fry on."

quotes.speaker: Kelly
quotes.text: Boring.

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.text: Uh, "The moon is huge tonight."

quotes.speaker: Phyllis
quotes.text: Ooh, gosh, the moon one's damning. Yeah, sorry.

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.text: That's regular text talk.

quotes.speaker: Brandon
quotes.text: You forgot one.

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.text: "You're such a great friend."

quotes.speaker: Brandon
quotes.text: With the dots.

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.text: "You're such a great friend, dot dot dot dot dot."

quotes.speaker: Kelly
quotes.text: Five dots, Darryl, are you kidding me? Okay, 'cause three dots means 'to be continued', four dots is a typo, but five dots means "Whoa, do not make me say what I want to say, baby, but if I did, it would blow your mind, dot, dot, dot, dot, dot.

quotes.speaker: Everyone
quotes.text: Oh...

quotes.speaker: Brandon
quotes.text: See? Yes. Thank you, sister.

quotes.speaker: Val
quotes.text: Brandon, Darryl and me? That's ridiculous, right?

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.text: Yeah, totally crazy. Puts me in an insane asylum just thinking about it. I'm stranded on shutter island over here.

quotes.speaker: Nellie
quotes.text: You look like Ed Harris if they stretched him a little bit.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: You wanna see a picture of me trapped under a tree? [cell phone rings] ...ahhmmm... excuse me... What?! Not now, I'm busy.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: [on phone] I'm sorry, I thought you'd want to know that I saw a bedbug in my room. But, never mind, sorry to interrupt.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Wait wait wait wait, bedbugs? Oh no... Freak, I need a favor.

quotes.speaker: Gabe
quotes.text: Well, then you have to call me by my name. Gabriel Susan Lewis.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: I gotta be gone for a few minutes. You make sure that Packer does NOT sleep with Nellie.

quotes.speaker: Gabe
quotes.text: What's in it for GSL?

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: You really want Packer as your boss?

quotes.speaker: Gabe
quotes.text: Got it.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: If Jim has bedbugs, that means they're everywhere. I can't risk them coming back to Schrute Farms. Our biggest attraction is our 200 year old mattresses.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Where did you see it?

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: In the bed.

quotes.speaker: Cathy
quotes.text: I haven't seen anything.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: We gotta find it before it eggs. [pulls sheets off bed]

quotes.speaker: Cathy
quotes.text: Jeez...

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Describe it.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Brown, shiny, painful bite.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Could be a bat weevil... Describe its mood. Did it seen sleepy?

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Stressed, but to be fair, it was a tense situation.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Fair enough, but after it bit you, did it run away fearful, or did it walk away smug, self-assured?

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: So smug. Like he thought it was funny, like this.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Pshh. That's a bedbug.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Yeah.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Everything's a joke.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: I know.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Check your hair! [checks Jim's hair]

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Ow.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: God, oh. So greasy, you should just shave all this.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Just check it.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: You are clean. Okay... One thing a bedbug thrives on is heat and carbon dioxide [starts running in place and turning up the thermostat] I am going to generate myself into a human trap. [starts to take off clothes] When I jump into the bed, you are going to cover me with the sheet immediately. And then we'll see who's laughing. [dastardly laugh]

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Alright.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Yeah. [jumps into bed] Cover me!

quotes.speaker: Cathy
quotes.text: Is this really nessecary?

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: He knows what he's doing.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Let the bedbugs bite!

quotes.speaker: Cathy
quotes.text: Ugh, god, I feel so gross. I have to go take a shower.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Alright, then I will catch you later... What do we do now?

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: We wait. [Shower starts] Come to papa.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Oh.

quotes.speaker: None
quotes.text: [Packer and Nellie are speaking softly to each other. Gabe sprays his inhaler into Packer's drink.]

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: I don't know, Dwight, I think maybe you should check again.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Nope, I wasn't bitten.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Well, maybe it isn't warm enough in here.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Oh, it's plenty warm, and I was farting continuously under the sheet, creating a kind of greenhouse effect.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Come on.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: If there were any in here, They would've imbedded themselves in me.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: You know what? Maybe they just ate.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: No, you're good. Clean bill of health! Besides I gotta get back downstairs. I left Packer alone with Nellie for way too long.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Okay, they're fine. They're adults.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: No, that's the problem. Packer is trying to bed Nellie for the VP job unless I do it first.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Is that really how you want to get this job?

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Such a chorus girl.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Okay, Dwight... Dwight... Dwight, Dwight Dwight!... uh...

quotes.speaker: Cathy
quotes.text: [in a bathrobe] Is crazy gone?

quotes.speaker: None
quotes.text: [Jim does his signature face]

quotes.speaker: None
quotes.text: [Nellie and Packer are dancing. Gabe winks at Dwight. Packer pukes all over Gabe's slacks and walks off.]

quotes.speaker: Nellie
quotes.text: Oh!

quotes.speaker: Gabe
quotes.text: They don't make these cords in boot cut anymore!

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Euughh... Pathetic, huh? A real man swallows his vomit when a lady is present... Hey.

quotes.speaker: Cathy
quotes.text: Yeah, one death by chocolate, one bananas foster... Okay, cool. Thanks... I know, I'm a pig, right?

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Hmm? No.

quotes.speaker: Cathy
quotes.text: [giggles] Wait, this why I exercise like a fiend. Feel. Seriously.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Okay alright. [gets up] I'm really sorry, uh, I just have to say it. I'm-I'm married. I'm very happily married.

quotes.speaker: Cathy
quotes.text: Oh my God, what are you thinking?

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: um... I mean-

quotes.speaker: Cathy
quotes.text: I know that you're married, I sat at your wife's desk. How little do you think of me?

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: I'm sorry, I feel like maybe I'm-I'm I misread things. Okay, let's just go back to watching.

quotes.speaker: Cathy
quotes.text: Can you... without running to the other side of the room all night?

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Yes, I can. [Cathy laughs] uh, all right. I'm really sorry. I think we'll just... we'll just watch. You can watch, not watch, whatever you want to do. Take another shower, I don't care.

quotes.speaker: Cathy
quotes.text: Okay. [Sits next to Jim.] I am so cold.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: [Jim Face]

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Hey, Darryl. You okay?

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.text: She's got a boyfriend.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Play it cool, man. She'll come around.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: No, you should go for it. I mean nothing would've happened with me and Jim if he didn't put himself out there.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Yeah, but... My friend Jim would tell you to play it cool.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: My husband would tell you to go for it.

quotes.speaker: Ryan
quotes.text: Hey.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Hey.

quotes.speaker: Ryan
quotes.text: Hey.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Hey.

quotes.speaker: Ryan
quotes.text: Hey, this is fun.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: A lot of fun.

quotes.speaker: Ryan
quotes.text: I know. Can I give you a compliment? I'm really impressed by how much you've grown. Since I met you, it's like night and day.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: You should move down here with me.

quotes.speaker: Ryan
quotes.text: Yeah?

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: We could be roommates.

quotes.speaker: Ryan
quotes.text: Really?

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: We could get a dog. We could go to R-rated movies. And who knows, I mean, you're a guy, I'm a girl-

quotes.speaker: Ryan
quotes.text: Yeah.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Maybe in six months-

quotes.speaker: Ryan
quotes.text: [louder] Six months?... um, okay, I'm in love with Kelly.

quotes.speaker: Nellie
quotes.text: Put your forehead near mine,  and see if you can read my thoughts.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Okay... Seven, one, one, nine...

quotes.speaker: Nellie
quotes.text: No, no, no, not numbers, no.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: No, okay.

quotes.speaker: Nellie
quotes.text: No.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Try again... Ugh, I'm still getting numbers! Seven, one, one... is anyone around here thinking the numbers seven one one? 'Cause please stop, okay?

quotes.speaker: Nellie
quotes.text: Dwight, give me a key card to your room. Meet me in seven minutes for some one-on-one time.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: [gasps]Wait, the numbers!

quotes.speaker: Nellie
quotes.text: Mm-hmm.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: oh...

quotes.speaker: Nellie
quotes.text: mm-hmm...

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: There you go.

quotes.speaker: Nellie
quotes.text: I will see you in seven-

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Seven minutes. [Dwight and Nellie kiss]... Nellie, wait. Let me write my room number on the card. [chuckles]. [Dwight writes on the key card scratches it with a magnet and hands it back to Nellie]

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: [in voiceover] Win at all costs, don't respect women. These are the tenets I was brought up with, and they have served me well. But my ancestors never worked in corporate America, and before that, hunters. And before that, time travelers. And before that, me again. At least, that's how the legend goes. The point is they never had to worry about how they got ahead. They just had to put food on the table and not alter the past.

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.text: It has been processed.

quotes.speaker: Val
quotes.text: It has been delivered.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: That's it, last one.

quotes.speaker: None
quotes.text: [Everyone applauds]

quotes.speaker: Kelly
quotes.text: Andy this has been an amazing night. Epic.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Cool-down fiesta begins right now. I got decaf coffee...

quotes.speaker: Phyllis
quotes.text: No way.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: I got Romy and Michele's High School Reunion...

quotes.speaker: Val
quotes.text: Hey. I just wanted to apologize. I mean, that was so weird. Can we just, like, never talk about it again?

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.text: Sure.

quotes.speaker: Val
quotes.text: Okay, thanks.

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.text: Hey, just so you know, me and you... I don't think that's ridiculous... Dot, dot, dot... dot, dot.

quotes.speaker: None
quotes.text: [Jim walks into his room to find a bathrobe on the floor]

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: All right. Now I think it's time for you to go.

quotes.speaker: Cathy
quotes.text: What? Oh, Jim, I thought we talked about this. You're cool, right?

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Cathy, go.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: [wearing face mask with spray chemicals in hand] Where's the bug?

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Awesome.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: [sprays the bed and Cathy] Stand back!

quotes.speaker: Cathy
quotes.text: Aah! Stop, it, oh my god! That burns! what is that?!

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: [continues spraying the bed] It's a compound of chemicals I pulled off the maid's cart!

quotes.speaker: Cathy
quotes.text: [coughs and moans]

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Right there! [points to Cathy]

quotes.speaker: Cathy
quotes.text: Oh stop it, stop it, stop it!

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: [coughs] Oh, big one! Big one! Really big one!

quotes.speaker: Cathy
quotes.text: I can't breathe!

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: I think I saw it!

quotes.speaker: Cathy
quotes.text: Stop it! [runs out the door]

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Nice job, I think you got 'em.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: You can't stay here, this place is a biohazard. If I were you, I'd just bunk with Cathy.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: [Jim face]

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Second best Bananas Foster I've ever had.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Oh yeah? What's the first best?

quotes.speaker: Nellie
quotes.text: [at the door, unsuccessfully trying to open it with the demagnetized key card] Dwight? [knocks] Hello? Dwight?

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: [whispers] Is that Nellie?

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: [whispers] Don't let-shh!

quotes.speaker: Nellie
quotes.text: Are you in there? I can see the light on under your door. Hello? [knocks] [Dwight turns off the lights] Oh, look at that. The light went off, just as I said the light went on. Hello? [knocks] Dwight? [whispers] Dwight. [Dwight eats his Bananas Foster]
